general_settings.name: from_name
general_settings.value: ADFAS :: Associação de Direito de Família e das Sucessões

messages_settings.name: payment_success_title
messages_settings.value: Obrigado, seu pagamento foi processado com sucesso!

messages_settings.name: payment_success_message
messages_settings.value:
Obrigado pelo seu pagamento. Em breve, você deverá receber um e-mail para confirmar a transação.

Use o menu à direita, ou clique em um dos links abaixo para continuar.

  • Página Inicial
  • Seu Perfil

messages_settings.name: payment_failed_title
messages_settings.value: Ocorreu um problema inesperado, o pagamento não pôde ser processado, tente novamente mais tarde.

messages_settings.name: payment_failed_message
messages_settings.value:
Ocorreu um problema inesperado, o pagamento não pôde ser processado, tente novamente mais tarde. Em breve, você deverá receber um e-mail para confirmar.

Use o menu à direita, ou clique em um dos links abaixo para continuar.

  • Página Inicial
  • Seu Perfil

messages_settings.name: text_guest_purchase_pre_button
messages_settings.value:
Você está prestes a adquirir \"[post_title]\" como Convidado, por [purchase_cost].
Membros que podem acessar o conteúdo sem comprá-lo separadamente, 

[membership_types]

messages_settings.name: text_guest_purchase_pre_register
messages_settings.value:

Membros que podem acessar o conteúdo sem comprá-lo separadamente, 

[membership_types]
Por favor, cliquem em Comprar abaixo e consigam acesso imediato ao texto.

messages_settings.name: login_errmsg_null
messages_settings.value: Sua conta não está ativa. Para ativá-la, por favor complete a inscrição e o pagamento.

messages_settings.name: login_errmsg_expired
messages_settings.value: Sua conta expirou. Para ativá-la, por favor faça uma nova inscrição e o pagamento para se recadastrar.

messages_settings.name: login_errmsg_date_range
messages_settings.value: Sua conta expirou. Para ativá-la, por favor faça uma nova inscrição e o pagamento para se recadastrar.

messages_settings.name: login_errmsg_trial_expired
messages_settings.value: Sua conta expirou. Para ativá-la, por favor faça uma nova inscrição e o pagamento para se recadastrar.

messages_settings.name: login_errmsg_pending
messages_settings.value: Sua conta está em processo de APROVAÇÃO! Aguarde só mais um pouco.

messages_settings.name: login_errmsg_default
messages_settings.value: Sua conta não está ativa

messages_settings.name: login_errmsg_cancelled
messages_settings.value: Sua conta foi CANCELADA. Para ativá-la, por favor faça uma nova inscrição e o pagamento para se recadastrar.

messages_settings.name: login_errmsg_multiple_logins
messages_settings.value: Your login exceeded allowed IPs. Please logout other active sessions.

emails_settings.name: reminder_email_template_body
emails_settings.value:
Prezado(a) [name],

Sua conta irá se expirar em [expire_date]
Este éThis is only a notice, do not be concerned. After your membership expires, when you try to login, a box will appear above the login panel: \"Your account has expired. To continue using this site, please make a subscription payment to re-activate your account.\" Simply click \"subscriptions payment\" which is hyperlinked and reactivate by choosing what term of membership you want and finally passing through the payment gateway to complete the transaction. You will not loose your user name or access credentials during expiration or the renewal process.

emails_settings.name: new_user_notification_email_template_body
emails_settings.value:
Dear Admin,

New user registration on your blog [blogname]
Username : [username]
E-mail : [email]
Membership Type : [membership_type]
Membership Amount : [amount]

emails_settings.name: user_upgrade_notification_email_template_body
emails_settings.value:
Dear Admin,

User upgraded on your blog [blogname]
Username : [username]
E-mail : [email]
Membership Type : [membership_type]
Membership Amount : [amount]

emails_settings.name: payment_success_email_template_body
emails_settings.value:
This is an automatic notification from [blogname] to [name] ([email]).
This is a notification to inform you that your payment was successful and the post you purchased is now available to view.
For more information please contact [admin_email].

emails_settings.name: payment_success_subscription_email_template_body
emails_settings.value:
This is an automatic notification from [blogname] to [name] ([email]).
This is a notification to inform you that your payment was successful for [payment_type] of [subscription].
For more information please contact [admin_email].

emails_settings.name: payment_failed_email_template_body
emails_settings.value:
This is an automatic notification from [blogname] to [name] ([email]).
This is a notification to inform you that your [payment_type] failed for the following reason: [reason].
For more information please contact [admin_email].

emails_settings.name: payment_active_email_template_body
emails_settings.value:
This is an automatic notification from [blogname] to [name] ([email]).
This is a notification to inform you that your Subscription has been activated.
For more information please contact [admin_email].

emails_settings.name: payment_pending_email_template_body
emails_settings.value:
This is an automatic notification from [blogname] to [name] ([email]).
This is a notification to inform you that your payment was received in pending status. Status: [reason].
For more information please contact [admin_email].

emails_settings.name: payment_error_email_template_body
emails_settings.value:
This is an automatic notification from [blogname] to [name] ([email]).
This is a notification to inform you that an error occurred while processing your payment.
Details: [reason].
For more information please contact [admin_email].

emails_settings.name: payment_unknown_email_template_body
emails_settings.value:
This is an automatic notification from [blogname] to [name] ([email]).
Status: [reason].
For more information please contact [admin_email].

emails_settings.name: subscription_cancelled_email_template_body
emails_settings.value:
This is an automatic notification from [blogname] to [name] ([email]).
This is a notification to inform you that your subscription has been cancelled.
For more information please contact [admin_email].

emails_settings.name: retrieve_password_email_template_body
emails_settings.value:
Someone has asked to reset the password for the following site and username.
[siteurl]
Username: [username]
To reset your password visit the following address, otherwise just ignore this email and nothing will happen.
[passwordlink]

emails_settings.name: lost_password_email_template_body
emails_settings.value:
Site:[blogname]
Username: [username]
Password: [password]
Login here
[loginurl]

emails_settings.name: gift_post_email_template_body
emails_settings.value:
Dear [name],
This is a notification to inform you that you have a received gift post from [blogname] .
Gift Post Link : [post_title]
For more information please contact [admin_email].
